html:
5.16.25  1:12 pm   do you have any idea?

      oh man that would explain the ridiculous life i lead

5.16.25  12:53 pm   mr. bill, what color should i dye my hair?

      surprise me

5.16.25  12:51 pm   How can I contact the thing inventor inventor?

      why don't you make one

5.16.25  10:14 am   Are you working on a video

      not only

5.16.25  8:59 am   Why do we capitalize proper nouns?

      to show respect

5.16.25  8:37 am   have you ever realized how fancy the times new roman uppercase Q looks?

      no, but i just checked it out and i don't think it looks very fancy

5.16.25  6:07 am   do u know French 

      ..... i know about french

5.16.25  2:47 am   do you know all the lyrics to your songs by heart or do you forget them as soon as you're done writing them? (or is the truth somewhere in the middle)

      after i write them is when i need to start remembering them, of course because then i have to sing it. then in the course of producing it i probably can't get away from it because i have to hear it a trillion times. after that, they might be harder to remember but i could probably figure it out just from having heard it so many times while producing it

5.16.25  1:47 am   what percent of things are worth giving a fuck about

      49.9999999999%

5.16.25  12:42 am   Are you awake?

      sometimes

5.16.25  12:01 am   what do u do when ur terrified?

      maybe take a nap

5.15.25  11:38 pm   You a ladies man, bill? 

      no

5.15.25  10:53 pm   what's the best kind of carpet

      flying

5.15.25  10:48 pm   what was the question that damien maymdien skipped in maybe i could eat blades of grass? it's the first video of yours i ever saw and it's been bugging me for 5 years

      this one

5.15.25  9:27 pm   what came before the big bang

      what do you think before means

5.15.25  9:26 pm   guess which one of your songs i am listening to

      guess which one of my songs i'm making

5.15.25  9:03 pm   Layoffs feel imminent at my job and I'm not handling it well. I know I should just allow things to happen however they do, but it's difficult. What advice do you have for this kind of thing?

      i don't see why this wouldn't be the opportunity for a very important discovery

5.15.25  8:13 pm   Why, how are you on this fine evening?

      are you telling me the evening is fine

5.15.25  8:07 pm   Really important question Bill, but I can't spare the details because the context would take an hour to explain: yes or no? (pick one)

      or

5.15.25  7:43 pm   i dont feel like asking a question right now

      that's ok

5.15.25  4:00 pm   how do clouds fly without wings

      they float, on top of the air below. like a leaf floats on water

5.15.25  2:16 pm   do you think with words?

      quelquefois

5.15.25  2:12 pm   How much is an amount?

      this much

5.15.25  2:00 pm   as humans, we are so much more alike than we are different. why do we tend to get so focused on our differences? is there anything we can do to help society at large value our commonality more?

      i thought it was actually the other way. commonalities play extremely well in society, to the point of insincerity and boredom, while the differences can sometimes feel underappreciated and underaccepted

5.15.25  1:57 pm   Hello Wurtz, I been listening to your music for a while now(a year or 2??) and I want to recommend your music to my friends, but I don't really know what genre of music yours falls in. So what genre is your music?(Most of the time at least)

      imagine if i couldn't answer this question without knowing what genre the question falls under

5.15.25  1:37 pm   Why do we sometimes refer to text all capitalized as shouting or screaming?

      because it's mostly bigger, so there is the visual perception that it takes up more soundspace and makes more noise, and uses more force

5.15.25  1:02 pm   What's your favorite bird? 

      it's fun when either a bird turns out to be a plane or a plane turns out to be a bird

5.15.25  12:40 pm   Is zero technically the biggest number? It's the sum total of all numbers, both positive and negative.

      i'll admit it's kind of indistinguishable from infinity. it has very similar qualities

5.15.25  12:16 pm   can you teach me how to flirt?

      no, flirting is not appropriate. just talk normally and actually. this is way more effective anyway

5.15.25  11:57 am   what's steves real name

      the same as yours

5.15.25  11:29 am   do you like math because i really like math

      math is extremely grounding

5.15.25  11:24 am   Are the questions purple for you when you first see them or do they turn purple when you upload them to the page? 

      i see them in purple

5.15.25  8:43 am   have you ever considered learning indonesian (turns out the language isn't called bahasa, as bahasa literally means language) for fun and giggles? like, halo, i guess. apa kabar

      i have spent some time studying indonesian videos and vlogs in the malay language. so i have had some exposure to the language, and it's probably in 14th place for the amount of time i've spent on a language

5.15.25  8:14 am   how do you feel about having fans

      pretty good

5.15.25  4:55 am   What question did I ask again?

      was it this one

5.15.25  4:32 am   Does everything that can go wrong, do so?

      no

5.15.25  2:16 am   Describe yourself in a single word.

      billwurtz

5.15.25  12:39 am   Thoughts on the letter q/Q?

      eloquent, exquisite, quintessential requirement for requests & inquiries

5.14.25  11:49 pm   what should i eat first at the fancy buffet

      how about bread

5.14.25  10:38 pm   how to overcome shame?

      time

5.14.25  10:36 pm   is the guy from "how to pull a rabbit out of a hat" still stuck in a barren wasteland

      no

5.14.25  9:54 pm   Ahh!! Spent all day on a small but crucial part of the project and I feel terrible that I didn't get more done. If I could find out how to PRIORITISE...
?????¿????

      eventually you will find solutions where you need them, but i don't think you really did anything 'wrong' here

5.14.25  9:46 pm   favorite number of the alphabet?

      I

5.14.25  8:37 pm   is confidence ever bad? I don't want to get too much of it

      that's fair. you will probably find a nice friendly good amount

5.14.25  8:17 pm   i'm on the computer right now

      oh that sounds exciting

5.14.25  7:00 pm   is there a criteria you follow when choosing questions to answer?

      sure, i answer this one

5.14.25  6:50 pm   do souls make soul music or do humans make soul music?

     that's a trick question

     are we souls in a body that we rent out for a few decades?

     that certainly doesn't sound unreasonable

     is james brown god, as "the godfather of soul", and also because he died on christmas 2006?

      no i don't know where you're going with this

5.14.25  5:52 pm   do you like mozart

      i'm not entirely familiar with mozart but i also don't dislike mozart

5.14.25  5:20 pm   was the location in hi im steve inspired by anywhere in the world

      no

5.14.25  4:44 pm   I'm on a quest to THINK about EVERYTHING. Any tips on where to start?

      anywhere, but dont forget to also feel and do. otherwise you'll eventually get bored and uncomfortable
